npcMessage.comment:
Greetings.  Are you interested in changing professions?  If so, I might be able to help you.  Recent advances in Mon-Cal neuro-nanite technologies have enabled us to transmute the knowledge you possess of your current profession to that of a different profession. 

Are you interested?

playerMessage.comment: I'm interested in changing my profession, but how much does it cost?
Resetting my expertise sounds interesting, but how much will it cost me?
